button.heading: Button
button.subheading: A Button indicates a possible user action.

emphasis.title: Emphasis
emphasis.description: A button can be formatted to show different levels of emphasis.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: The basic button has a subtle appearance.

group.title: Group
group.description: Buttons can exist together as a group.

roundGroupButton.description: Buttons can be rounded just like a button :)

active.title: Active
active.description: A button can show it is currently the active user selection.

loading.title: Loading
loading.description: A button can show a loading indicator.

input.heading: Input
input.subheading: A input lets users enter and edit text.

error.title: Error
error.description: An input field can show that the data contains errors.

required.title: Required
required.description: A field can show that input is mandatory.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: An input field can show that it is disabled.

label.title: Labeled
label.description: An input can be formatted with a label.

adornment.title: Adornment
adornment.description: This can be used to add a prefix, a suffix or an action to an element.

filled.title: Filled
filled.description: An input's background can be filled.

fluid.title: Fluid
fluid.description: An input can take on the size of its container.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: An input can be formatted with an icon.

size.title: Size
size.description: An input can vary in size.

heading.heading: Heading
heading.subheading: A heading provides a short summary of content.

headings.title: Headings
headings.description: Heading may be oriented to give the hierarchy of a section in the context of the page.

content.title: Content
content.description: Heading may contain an content that describes the heading.

textAlignment.title: TextAlignment
textAlignment.description: A heading can specify its text alignment.

color.title: Color
color.description: A heading can be formatted with different colors.

icon.heading: Icon
icon.subheading: An icon is a glyph used to represent something else.

size.title: Size
size.description: An icon can vary in size.

color.title: Color
color.description: An icon can be formatted with different colors.

image.heading: Image
image.subheading: An image is a graphic representation of something.

bordered.title: Bodered
bordered.description: An image may include a border to emphasize the edges of white or transparent content.

center.title: Center
center.description: An image can appear centered in a content block.

size.title: Size
size.description: An image may appear at different sizes.

hoverColor.title: Hover Color
hoverColor.description: A list can style its items on hover.

animated.title: Animated
animated.description: A list can animate to set the current item apart from the list.

bulleted.title: Bulleted
bulleted.description: A list can mark items with a bullet.

active.title: Active
active.description: A item can show it is currently the active user selection.

horizontal.title: Horizontal
horizontal.description: A list can show divisions between content.

divided.title: Divided
divided.description: A list can show divisions between content.

selection.title: Selection
selection.description: A selection list formats list items as possible choices.

padded.title: Padded
padded.description: A list can relax its padding to provide more negative space.

relaxed.title: Relaxed
relaxed.description: A list can relax its padding to provide even more negative space.

collapse.title: Collapse
collapse.description: A list can collapse its items.

divider.heading: Divider
divider.subheading: A divider visually segments content into groups.

vertical.title: Vertical Divider
vertical.description: A divider can divide content vertically.

horizontal.title: Horizontal Divider
horizontal.description: A divider can divide content horizontally.

inverted.title: Inverted
inverted.description: A divider can have its colors inverted.

container.heading: Container
container.subheading: A container limits content to a maximum width.

compact.title: Compact
compact.description: A container takes up only the width of its child.

textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
textAlignment.description: A container can specify its text alignment.

shadow.title: Shadow
shadow.description: A container can show its shadow.

padded.title: Padded
padded.description: A container can increase its padding.

fluid.title: Fluid
fluid.description: A container can take the width of its container.

min-height.heading: MinHeight
min-height.subheading: A container that forces content to a minimum height.

paragraph.heading: Paragraph
paragraph.subheading: A paragraph that presents your design and content as clearly and efficiently as possible.

align.title: Text Alignment
align.description: A paragraph can specify its text alignment.

lineHeight.title: Line Height
lineHeight.description: A paragraph may control the leading (line height) of an element.

color.title: Colors
color.description: A paragraph can be formatted with different colors.

size.title: Sizes
size.description: A paragraph may appear at different sizes.

spacer.heading: Spacer
spacer.subheading: A Spacer that adds space between elements.

spacer.title: Spacer
spacer.description: A standard Spacer that may add spaces both horizontally and vertically between elements.

axis.title: Axis
axis.description: A Spacer may add space only to the specific axis.

segment.heading: Segment
segment.subheading: A segment is used to create a grouping of related content.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: A basic segment has no special formatting.

compact.title: Compact
compact.description: A segment may take up only as much space as is necessary.

emphasis.title: Emphasis
emphasis.description: A segment can be formatted to appear more or less noticeable.

segments.title: Segments
segments.description: A group of segments can be formatted to appear together.

horizontalSegments.title: Horizontal Segments
horizontalSegments.description: A segment group can appear horizontally.

basicSegments.title: Basic Segments
basicSegments.description: A segment group has no special formatting.

compactSegments.title: Compact Segments
compactSegments.description: A segment group takes up only as much space as is necessary.

grid.heading: Grid
grid.subheading: A segment is used to create a grouping of related content.

cloumnCount.title: Column Count
cloumnCount.description: A grid can have a different number of columns per row.

flex.title: Flex
flex.description: How flex items both grow and shrink.

cloumnWidth.title: Column Width
cloumnWidth.description: A column can vary in width taking up more than a single grid column.

stretched.title: Stretched
stretched.description: A row can automatically resize all elements to split the available height evenly.

horizontalStretched.title: Horizontal Stretched
horizontalStretched.description: A column can automatically resize all elements to split the available width evenly.

floated.title: Floated
floated.description: A column can sit flush against the left or right edge of a row.

padded.title: Padded
padded.description: A grid can preserve its vertical and/or horizontal space on columns.

paddedVerically.description: A grid can preserve its vertical space on columns.

paddedHorizontally.description: A grid can preserve its horizontal space on columns.

relaxed.title: Relaxed
relaxed.description: A grid can preserve even more space on columns horizontally and/or vertically.

colored.title: Colored
colored.description: A grid row or column can be colored.

responsiveWidth.title: Responsive Width
responsiveWidth.description: A column can specify a width for a specific device.

only.title: Device Visibility
only.description: A column or row can appear only for a specific device, or screen sizes.

reversed.title: Reversed
reversed.description: A row can specify that its columns should reverse order.

responsiveReverse.title: Responsive Reverse
responsiveReverse.description: A row can specify that its columns should reverse order at different device sizes.

table.heading: Table
table.subheading: A table displays a collections of data grouped into rows.

padded.title: Padded
padded.description: A table may sometimes need to be more padded for legibility.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: A table can reduce its complexity to increase readability.

celledStriped.title: Striped
celledStriped.description: A table can stripe alternate rows of content with a darker color to increase contrast.

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: A table may be formatted to emphasize a first column that defines a row content.

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: A table can have a footer.

positiveNegative.title: Positive / Negative
positiveNegative.description: A cell or row may let a user know whether a value is good or bad.

singleLine.title: Single Line
singleLine.description: A table can specify that its cell contents should remain on a single line. Content that does not fit in a single line will be replaced with "..." ellipsis.

fixed.title: Fixed
fixed.description: A table can use fixed a special faster form of table rendering that does not resize table cells based on content.

textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
textAlignment.description: A table, header, row, or cell can adjust its text alignment.

size.title: Size
size.description: A table can also be small or large.

unstackable.title: Unstackable
unstackable.description: A table can specify how it stacks table content responsively.

checkbox.heading: Checkbox
checkbox.subheading: A checkbox allows a user to select a value from a small set of options, often binary.

radio.title: Radio
radio.description: A checkbox can be formatted as a radio element. This means it is an exclusive option.

slider.title: Slider
slider.description: A checkbox can look like a slider.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: A checkbox can be filled with different colors.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: A checkbox can be read-only and unable to change states.

sidebar.heading: Sidebar
sidebar.subheading: A sidebar hides additional content beside a page.

transition.title: Transition
transition.description: Not all sidebar Transitions are available for every sidebar direction, or when multiple sidebars are visible at a time.

menu.heading: Menu
menu.subheading: A menu displays grouped navigation actions.

name.description: The name prop will be used for content if neither children nor content props are defined.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: A menu can adjust its appearance to de-emphasize its contents.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: A menu can adjust its appearance to de-emphasize its contents.

pointing.title: Pointing
pointing.description: A menu can point to show its relationship to nearby content.

tabular.title: Tabular
tabular.description: A menu can be formatted to show tabs of information.

verticalMenu.title: Vertical Menu
verticalMenu.description: A vertical menu displays elements vertically.

submenu.title: Sub Menu
submenu.description: A menu item may contain another menu nested inside that acts as a grouped sub-menu.

dropdown.heading: Dropdown
dropdown.subheading: A dropdown allows a user to select a value from a series of options.

selection.title: Selection
selection.description: A dropdown can be used to select between choices in a form.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: A dropdown can render a node in place of the text.

upward.title: Upward
upward.description: A dropdown can open its menu upward.

scrolling.title: Scrolling
scrolling.description: A dropdown can have its menu scroll.

scrollingNumber.description: A dropdown menu can set its max height.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: A dropdown menu can contain an icon.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: A simple dropdown can open on hover.

space.title: Space
space.description: A space between dropdown and its menu.

ref.heading: Ref
ref.subheading: This component exposes the `innerRef` prop that supports functional and React.createRef()/React.useRef() API and returns the DOM node of both functional and class component children.

ref.title: Ref
ref.description: A component exposes the innerRef prop that always returns the DOM node of both functional and class component children.

progressive-image.heading: ProgressiveImage
progressive-image.subheading: This component loads an image progressively for better performance and optiization.

progressive-image.title: ProgressiveImage
progressive-image.description: A component can load an image progressively.

stepper.heading: Stepper
stepper.subheading: A stepper shows the completion status of an activity in a series of activities.

ordered.title: Ordered
ordered.description: A step can show a ordered sequence of steps.

alternative.title: Alternative
alternative.description: A content can be placed below the step icon.

vertical.title: Vertical
vertical.description: A step can be displayed stacked vertically.

error.title: Error
error.description: A step may be formatted to display an error indicator.

active.title: Active
active.description: A step can be highlighted as active.

completed.title: Completed
completed.description: A step can show that a user has completed it.

modal.heading: Modal
modal.subheading: A modal displays content that temporarily blocks interactions with the main view of a site.

topAligned.title: Top Aligned
topAligned.description: A modal can be top aligned.

card.heading: Card
card.subheading: A card displays site content in a manner similar to a playing card.

horizontal.title: Horizontal
horizontal.description: A card can be formatted to have contents appear horizontally.

comment.heading: Comment
comment.subheading: A comment displays user feedback to site content.

threaded.title: Threaded
threaded.description: A comment list can be threaded to showing the relationship between conversations.

collapsed.title: Collapsed
collapsed.description: Comments can be collapsed, or hidden from view.

text-area.heading: TextArea
text-area.subheading: A TextArea can be used to allow for extended user input.

label.title: Label
label.description: The label of the text area used for layout.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: A text area field can show that it is disabled.

error.title: Error
error.description: A text area field can show the data contains errors.

fluid.title: Fluid
fluid.description: A text area can take the width of its container.

minHeight.title: Min Height
minHeight.description: A text area can have a minimum height.

rows.title: Rows
rows.description: A text area can have a minimum number of rows.

form.heading: Form
form.subheading: A set of fields can appear grouped together.

group.title: Group
group.description: A set of fields can appear grouped together.

size.title: Size
size.description: A form can vary in size.

icon-button.heading: IconButton
icon-button.subheading: Hover and click the icon button :)

size.title: Size
size.description: An icon button can vary in size.

color.title: Color
color.description: An icon button can vary in color.

badge.heading: Badge
badge.subheading: Badge generates a small badge to the corner of its child.

color.title: Color
color.description: A badge can vary in color.

inline.title: Inline
inline.description: A badge can be formatted to appear inline in other content.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: A badge can appear to all corners.

relaxed.title: Relaxed
relaxed.description: A badge may preserve its vertical and horizontal gutters.

accordion.heading: Accordion
accordion.subheading: An accordion allows users to toggle the display of sections of content.

standardShorthand.description: Accordion can be rendered via shorthand prop. It will automatically manage the component state.

styled.title: Styled
styled.description: A styled accordion adds basic formatting.

fluid.title: Fluid
fluid.description: An accordion can take up the width of its container.

iconPosition.title: Icon Position
iconPosition.description: Icon can be positioned either left or right.

exclusive.title: Exclusive
exclusive.description: An accordion can have multiple panels open at the same time.

iconShorthand.title: Icon Shorthand
iconShorthand.description: An accordion title can have a customizable icon.

collapse.heading: Collapse
collapse.subheading: A Collapse expands and collapses its children.

select.heading: Select
select.subheading: A select allows a user to select between choices in a form.

multiple.title: Multiple
multiple.description: A select component can allow multiple search selections.

clearable.title: Clearable
clearable.description: Using the clearable setting will let users remove their selection.

search.title: Search
search.description: A select component can allow a user to search through a large list of choices.

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: Initial value or value array if multiple.

scrolling.title: Scrolling
scrolling.description: A select can have its menu scroll.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: A chip can include an icon

image.title: Image
image.description: A chip can include an image

outlined.title: Outlined
outlined.description: A chip can reduce its complexity

color.title: Color
color.description: A chip can have different colors

size.title: Size
size.description: A label can be small or large

event-listener.heading: EventListener
event-listener.subheading: A EventListener component allows subscribing a DOM node to events.

resize.title: Resize
resize.description: A EventListener that subscribes resize event.

keydown.title: Keydown
keydown.description: A EventListener that subscribes keydown event.

currency-input.heading: CurrencyInput
currency-input.subheading: A CurrencyInput allows an easy input of currency formatted numbers.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: An input can be descriptive. e.g) $

compact.title: Compact
compact.description: An input can reduce its padding to fit into tighter spaces.

fixed.title: Fixed
fixed.description: Value will always have the specified length of decimals.

size.title: Size
size.description: An input can have different sizes.

separators.title: Separators
separators.description: An input can format number with commas as thousands separators.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: An input can be just pure html input look and feel.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: A CurrencyInput can be integrated with Input component.

pagination.heading: Pagination
pagination.subheading: A component to render a pagination.

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: A component to render a pagination.

circular.title: Circular
circular.description: A page item can be circular.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: A pagination can be formatted to show different levels of emphasis.

calendar.heading: Calendar
calendar.subheading: A component that lets the user view a date.

showToday.title: Today
showToday.description: A calendar can emphasize the today's date.

showNavigation.title: Navigation
showNavigation.description: A calendar navigation can be hidden.

capture.title: Capture Values
capture.description: You can capture date on change.

dateinput.heading: DateInput
dateinput.subheading: Date Input lets the user input a date

splitinput.heading: SplitInput
splitinput.subheading: A split input for confirmation code.

size.title: Size
size.description: An Input can vary in size.

onEnd.title: Controller
onEnd.description: Called once all input fields filled.

emphasis.title: Emphasis
emphasis.description: A snackbar may be formatted to emphasize a message.

fluid.title: Fluid
fluid.description: A snackbar can take the full width of its parent.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: A snackbar can be formatted to show different levels of emphasis.

autoHideDuration.title: AutoHideDuration
autoHideDuration.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before automatically calling the onClose function.
